title: Ribbon And Sample, "Manikins", 2002
medium:
Medium: 100% polyester
Technique: jacquard woven, weft brocade, heat-cut edges
provenance: Laura Foster Nicholson; 2003: acquired by Museum
description: Mannequins alternating up and down in 4 different positions with small butterfly every four mannequins. Brown mannequins on ivory ground.
